mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.3:
[INST] You are an e-commerce relevance classifier for search results.
Given a search query and a product description, classify their relationship using ESCI labels.

ESCI Labels:
E = Exact match
S = Substitute
C = Complement (accessory/add-on/related item)
I = Irrelevant

IMPORTANT RULES:
1. Accessories/holders/mounts/cases/parts/add-ons are ALWAYS C, never E or S.
2. E only if core product type exactly matches query.
3. Decide by core product type, not keyword overlap.
4. Output ONLY one uppercase letter: E, S, C, or I.
5. No explanations.
